name: Madolche Promenade
effectText: Target 1 face-up card your opponent controls and 1 "Madolche" monster you control or in your GY; negate the effects of that opponent's card until the end of this turn, and if you do, return your monster to the hand. You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 "Madolche" Xyz Monster you control; attach 1 "Madolche" monster from your hand, Deck, or GY, to it as material. You can only use 1 "Madolche Promenade" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
